guest.name: Wes Kao
guest.title: Co-founder
guest.background: Wes Kao is a pioneer in cohort-based learning, having co-founded Maven and the altMBA with Seth Godin. She is an expert in marketing, communication, and educational design, known for helping creators build rigorous, high-impact courses.
guest.background_zh: Wes Kao 是 Maven 的联合创始人，曾与 Seth Godin 共同创办 altMBA，是训练营式（Cohort-based）学习领域的先驱。她是市场营销、沟通和课程设计方面的专家，致力于帮助创作者打造高强度、高影响力的课程体系。

episodeSummary: Wes Kao joins Lenny to deconstruct the art of high-impact communication and career management. They discuss frameworks for writing with extreme specificity, techniques to keep audiences engaged during meetings, and actionable strategies for managing up effectively.
episodeSummary_zh: Wes Kao 做客 Lenny 的播客，深度拆解高影响力沟通与职业管理的艺术。本期节目涵盖了如何进行极度具体的写作、在会议中保持听众专注的技巧，以及高效向上管理的实战策略。
